CustomField.inlineHelpText: The dog's response to isolation for two minutes, as evidence by increasingly negative emotional arousal, fear, anxiety, grief, panic and/or frustration.
CustomField.label: Isolation

value.fullName: Rests/explores: low intensity exploration of room (sniffs, rests, eats/chews)
value.label: Rests/explores: low intensity exploration of room (sniffs, rests, eats/chews)

value.fullName: Low concern: exhibits minor frustration/distress on separation but recovers
value.label: Low concern: exhibits minor frustration/distress on separation but recovers

value.fullName: Mild concern: exhibits moderate signs of distress, may pant, pace, some vocalisation, but recovers and explores/rests after 1min
value.label: Mild concern: exhibits moderate signs of distress, may pant, pace, some vocalisation, but recovers and explores/rests after 1min

value.fullName: Moderate concern: intermittent panting, pacing, vocalisation throughout the time
value.label: Moderate concern: intermittent panting, pacing, vocalisation throughout the time

value.fullName: High concern: heavy panting, escape attempts, high intensity vocalisation, no recovery
value.label: High concern: heavy panting, escape attempts, high intensity vocalisation, no recovery

value.fullName: Severe concern: panic, anticipation before isolation, persistent signs of negative emotional state
value.label: Severe concern: panic, anticipation before isolation, persistent signs of negative emotional state
